meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a bibliomaniac.
meanings.sent1: Her bibliomaniacal excitement was evident as she entered the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: The bibliomaniacal collector had shelves overflowing with books.
meanings.sent3: His bibliomaniacal behavior led to a comical situation when he tried to fit more books on the already full shelf.
meanings.sent4: The bibliomaniacal passion for books burned brightly in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The bibliomaniacal nature of his obsession with books was unmatched by anyone else.

meanings.definition: Excessively fond of acquiring and possessing books.
meanings.sent1: The bibliomaniacal student couldn't resist buying every book she came across.
meanings.sent2: His bibliomaniacal love for books was evident in the way he carefully arranged them on his bookshelves.
meanings.sent3: The bibliomaniacal bookworm spent hours in the library, lost in the world of books.
meanings.sent4: Her bibliomaniacal tendencies turned her room into a mini library.
meanings.sent5: The bibliomaniacal joy of discovering a new book was unparalleled.
